p: M.E.O. None. T.S.C.H. has received unrestricted research grants from the Wellcome Trust (211050/Z/18/z, 211050/Z/18/A) and from the National Institute for Health Research (NIHR) Oxford Biomedical Research Centre (BRC), the University of Oxford COVID‐19 Research Response Fund and from Pfizer to support conduct of a trial of azithromycin in COVID‐19.
